mapper.sql: ncist.personNumber as ncist_personNumber, ncist.`identity` as `ncist_identity`, ncist.studentCollege as ncist_studentCollege, ncist.studentMajor as ncist_studentMajor, ncist.studentClass as ncist_studentClass, ncist.personSex as ncist_personSex, ncist.personName as ncist_personName

insert into ncist

personName,

mapper.update:

`identity` = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

studentMajor = #{studentMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where personNumber = #{personNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
